select productNo,name,prodGroup,approvalNum,approvalStatus
from( select rowNum as recNum, productNo,name,prodGroup,approvalNum,approvalStatus
from(
select product.productNo,product.name,product.prodGroup, productApproval.approvalNum,productApproval.approvalStatus
from product, productApproval
where product.productNo = productApproval.productNo order by approvalnum desc ) ) where recnum between (#{secNum}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{secNum}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}*10)

select count(rownum) from(
select rownum from product, productApproval
where product.productNo = productApproval.productNo order by approvalnum desc ) where rownum between (#{secNum}-1)*100+1 and (#{secNum}*100)

select product.productno,product.name,manufacturer.name as manufacturername, product.prodgroup,product.usemanual,asmanual,productimage from manufacturer,product where product.cuid=manufacturer.cuid and product.productNO=#{product.productNO}
select product.productno,component.name as componentname,component.price,component.part from component,product where component.productno=product.productno and product.productno=#{product.productNO}

select product.productNo,product.name,product.prodGroup, productApproval.approvalNum,productApproval.approvalStatus from product,productApproval where name like '%'||#{name}||'%' and product.productNo=productApproval.productNo order by approvalnum desc
